participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Wise and reflective, she enjoys sharing stories from her past.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i can sew my own clothes. i'm retired and living the great life. i had cancer but its gone now.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Energetic and determined, he is always looking for new opportunities.
participant_2.background: my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business.
